channel.title: Homes on Welcome
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Welcome

item.description: Hello I am at Google building systems to solve Privacy and Security issues at scale. Before joining Google, I obtained PhD at the Computer Science department at Duke University. My adviser is Dr. Landon Cox. I am a systems researcher and my research interests revolve around Mobile Computing and Internet of Things with a focus on Privacy and Security. My research projects have focussed on designing end-to-end systems to integrate efficient and scalable privacy modules to Android camera service.
